question: How does CalenterAI personalize my learning?
answer: CalenterAI uses advanced machine learning to analyze your learning style, pace, and goals. It adapts to your progress, adjusts difficulty levels, and recommends content that aligns with your specific needs, creating a truly personalized experience.

question: Can I use CalenterAI for any subject?
answer: Yes! CalenterAI supports a wide range of subjects including mathematics, science, languages, history, computer science, and professional skills. Our tutors are trained on comprehensive educational content to help you learn virtually any subject.

question: How do I track my progress?
answer: Our intuitive dashboard shows your learning metrics, including time spent, concepts mastered, and areas for improvement. You can view detailed analytics on your progress over time and receive personalized recommendations for continued improvement.

question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
answer: Absolutely. You can cancel your subscription at any time with no questions asked. Your subscription will remain active until the end of your current billing period, giving you time to download any materials you wish to keep.

question: Is there a mobile app available?
answer: Yes, CalenterAI is available on iOS and Android devices. Our mobile app syncs with your account, allowing you to continue your learning journey seamlessly across all your devices, whether you're at home or on the go.
